name: Lost Forest TD
description:
Lost Forest TD is a top-notch offline tower defense game, packed with sheer thrill, excitement and strategic gameplay!
Start off a great adventure as a Forest Keeper and protect the children by creating a deadly path for the monsters, who habitate the forest and chase them. You'd be fighting with huge variety of enemies with various skills and vulnerabilities that offer multiple challenges. Get ready for plenty of fun, insane weapons of destruction and unbelievable variety of defense towers with multiple upgrade levels! Use smart strategy to dominate your opponents and earn forest power!
Lost Forest TD is a completely offline game, however when you're back online you can upload your scores, check leaderboards, compete with other players and rise through the ranks to rein supreme. Build a reputation for brilliant strategy & ultimate defensive skills!

FEATURES
* A truly unique mixture of Tower Defense game with loads of challenges and extras!
* Free to Play! No ads, just straight into the fun-filled, challenging and addictive gameplay.
* Play anytime, anywhere. No-internet friendly, 100% offline.
* Explore the Lost Forest. Carefully position the towers for maximum efficiency and upgrade them for ultimate destruction.
* Check out the Monsterpedia- learn more about the powerful enemies and their unique abilities. When you face them off, you'll be victorious.
* Earn Forest Power and resourses to upgrade your Castle. Make the forest a safer place for the children!
* Beautiful landscape and character animations. Uniquely generated forest for each player. All this in amazing HD graphics!
* Upload your score to show off your tower defense skills. Check leaderboards, make your way up!
And more…

SUPPORT
